extracted_entities.name: Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering

details.application_process: Open application process for a fixed term of four years (assistant/associate professor) or permanently (full professor)
details.promotion: Tenure track system with promotion reviews
requirements: Up-to-date research merits in artificial intelligence related to software engineering
Expertise in topics such as AI in code generation, software testing, architecture design, AI agents in collaborative software development
duties: Basic and advanced education and programme development in software engineering
Preparation of national/international research and education projects
Planning and implementation of bachelor’s, master’s, and doctoral education
Supervision of final theses and doctoral studies
details.closing_date: 11 August 2025 at 12 noon, Finnish local time (UTC + 3h)
